title: public api oc6 - what's missing
body:
this issue is to be used as a todo list for public apis which are missing as of today.
please add a comment on what we miss and we will add this to the list below.

for each missing api a pull request is to be opened - once merged we can check the item on the todo list.

**how to implement a public api?**
1. create an interface in the public namespace within lib/public which acts as the entry point for accessing the functionality e.g. https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/5d4e9e0d25831cbe1b9c2fef52016c6ed1bbcb55/lib/public/ipreview.php#l14

2. add a getter to the iservercontainer - e.g. https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/5d4e9e0d25831cbe1b9c2fef52016c6ed1bbcb55/lib/public/iservercontainer.php#l56

3. implement the api within the **private** namespace e.g. https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/5d4e9e0d25831cbe1b9c2fef52016c6ed1bbcb55/lib/previewmanager.php

4. add the implementation of the getter to \oc\server - please use the provided methods registerservice() and query() because with this approach only those classes will be created which are going to be used 
https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/5d4e9e0d25831cbe1b9c2fef52016c6ed1bbcb55/lib/server.php#l88
https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/5d4e9e0d25831cbe1b9c2fef52016c6ed1bbcb55/lib/server.php#l49

**mainly important on all public classes, interfaces and methods: add proper phpdoc comments**

**missing apis**
- [x] file api - fixed with https://github.com/owncloud/core/pull/4712
- [x] avatar #5040
- [x] config - #4928
- [ ] search
- [ ] ocp\app with getappwebpath() & loadapps() - #4919
- [ ] oc_fileproxy - see below
- [x] oc_cache - #4886 
- [x] oc_appconfig - is done with the config interface
- [ ] oc::getversionstring() - maybe define an interface iutil?
- [ ] oc_app::disable() oc_app::enable() - coming in #5069
- [x] session (and kill session from irequest) - #4888
- [ ] user and group managers
- [ ] ocs api
- [x] template and related functions like nav menu - nav part in #4928
- [x] response sub classes
- [x] appframework - add public api for middleware handling - music app has a nice show case for middleware usage
- [x] activity api - consumed by activity app
- [x] usersession for login and logout - #4928
- [ ] itaskscheduler and itask
- [ ] iutil / ihelper
- [ ] iemitter
- [ ] eventsource
- [ ] ilog
- [x] database - #4928
- [x] l10n
- [x] middleware registration in app container.
